Jibo, Inc. | Character AI Developer | Boston, MA | Regular, Full-time | Onsite

Jibo is the world's first social robot for the home. Our AI team is looking for a developer who works collaboratively with others to plan, create, and implement aspects that make the robot feel lifelike, produce dynamic behavior, and allow him to behave in a manner that is consistent with his character. If you have a background in agent AI, machine learning, or a similar field as well as a passion for robotics and good UX, we'd like to hear from you!

Job description here: https://www.jibo.com/jobs?p=job%2FokK43fwV
